text: here within hours of the Orlando
massacre it was being politicized put
front and center in the battle for the
White House Donald Trump went on to
Twitter and he thanked people for
congratulating him about being right
about radical Islam as he put it he said
he didn't want congratulations he wanted
toughness and vigilance then in the past
few minutes he's released a statement
calling upon President Obama to resign
and Hillary Clinton to drop out of the
race because they refused to use that
term radical Islam President Clinton
President Obama has not used it because
he thinks it implies that America is at
war with a religion now Hillary Clinton
has announced that she is postponing
what was going to be her first joint
appearance with President Obama later in
the week but Donald Trump clearly
believes that Orlando will help him as
did Paris as did San Bernardino but
there are many people who will think
that trying to score political points on
a day like this is gross insensitivity
